language.none_permission: In order to use this command you need to have Manage Server permission.
language.language_already: Anmwaint's language is already set,you don't have to change it.
language.none_language: I can't find that language,if you want to add your language to the bot you can send your translations to this section: Anmwaint/Anmwaint-Language.
language.language_ready: Anmwaint's language has successfully changed to English,from now on I will speak English.

clear.none_permission: In order to use this command you need to have Manage Messages permission
clear.none_number: If you want me to delete messages you have to specify the amount of messages you want me to delete.
clear.discord_api: Because of Discord API rules I cant delete messages older than 2 weeks.
clear.max_size: Because of Discord API rules I can't delete more than **100** messages
clear.min_size: Because of Discord API rules I can delete a minimum of **1** message.
